doc.field: Series V: Leon Trotsky and Family, Friends, and Associates, 1930-1937.
Series V: Leon Trotsky and Family, Friends, and Associates, 1930-1937.

Leon Trotsky and Family, Friends, and Associates (Includes Max Shachtman and Gerald Rosenthal with Trotsky, and Natalia Sedova, Trotsky's second wife, and Trotsky, in Prinkipo, aka Büyükada, Turkey, in 1930; Shachtman and Frida Kahlo greeting Trotsky and Sedova on board the S.S. Ruth, on their arrival in Tampico, Mexico, January 1937; Diego Rivera with Trotsky during the Dewey Commission hearing held in Mexico in April 1937; Max Shachtman and Natalie Sedova circa 1950s; photocopies of a portrait of Trotsky's eldest son, Lyvov Sedov, and a newspaper/magazine story about the Dewey Commission hearing, April 1937, with photos including Trotsky in attendance.)
